posts._title: Lina Wertmüller – Notte d’Estate Con Profilo Greco, Occhi a Mandorla, e Odore di Basilico aka Summer Night (1986)
posts.title: Notte d’Estate Con Profilo Greco, Occhi a Mandorla, e Odore di Basilico
posts.excerpt: DVD Verdict Review : After a weak effort at an English-language film (A Night Full of Rain, with a miscast Candice Bergen), Wertmüller needed to reclaim her reputation. Hence, Summer Night, a recapitulation of Swept Away with fancier dress. Signora Bolk (Mariangela Melato), a rich woman who fancies herself an ecological activist, hires a former …

posts._title: Chan-wook Park – Saibogujiman kwenchana aka I’m a Cyborg But That’s OK (2006)
posts.title: Saibogujiman kwenchana
posts.excerpt: Plot Synopsis [AMG] After wrapping-up his critically-acclaimed “Vengeance Trilogy” with the award-winning 2005 thriller Sympathy for Lady Vengeance, South Korean filmmaker Chan-wook Park shifts gears for this gently comic romantic drama concerning a delusional young mental patient who believes herself to be a cyborg. Convinced that she is not entirely human but in fact part …

posts._title: Eric Rohmer – Cinéastes de notre temps: Carl Th. Dreyer (1965)
posts.title: Cinéastes de notre temps: Carl Th Dreyer
posts.excerpt: Interview in Copenhagen with Dreyer (speaking French). Also features Anna Karina, Preben Lerdorff Rye, Henrik Malberg, Lisbeth Movin, Jørgen Roos, and Bendt Rothe. First aired 8 April 1965 on ORTF (2?).

posts.title: Botched Eyeball Operation
posts.excerpt: A modern day homage to Un chien andalou deemed unviewable and exploitative by the Winnipeg Short Film Massacre. –DogmaToDisco

posts.title: La bête curieuse
posts.excerpt: Following a long prison term, 30 year-old Céline must find a place in society. Hiding her past, she introduces herself with a new identity to get work for a trial period in a hotel. Céline finds herself endlessly walking a tightrope between truth and fiction. When she meets Idir, despite the threat of being unmasked, …

posts.title: Reinos
posts.excerpt: Alejandro, a first-year student and Sofia, a final thesis student, meet at the University and build a relationship in which he falls in love while she just wants to satisfy his sexual desires. posts.excerpt: A dirty deal between cowboys. The fight between the Texan Benz, head of a gang of assassins, and Captain Mort, his right-hand man. posts.title: Schastye
posts.excerpt: Aleksandr Medvedkin’s Happiness, as rowdy as any Soviet silent movie, is a comic parable composed of equal parts of Tex Avery and Luis Buñuel. It satirizes the plight of a Soviet farmer who finds himself providing for the state, the church, and his peers at the expense of his personal satisfaction. A hapless young prole, …
